'''Donnamira Boffin, n√©e Took''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Donnamira was one of [[Gerontius Took|Old Took]]'s younger children, born in {{SR|1256}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref> She married [[Hugo Boffin]] and their children were [[Jago Boffin|Jago]] and [[Jessamine Boffin|Jessamine]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
==Etymology==
Donnamira's name participates in a circular wordplay with the names of her sisters, [[Belladonna Took|Bella'''donna''']] and [[Mirabella Took|'''Mira'''bella]], all Italian names.
